meanings.sent1: The unregenerate old house stood abandoned for years, untouched by any renovations.
meanings.sent2: The unregenerate forest remained wild and untouched by human hands.
meanings.sent3: Despite the warnings, the unregenerate squirrel kept raiding the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her unregenerate love for vintage cars never faded, like an old photograph.
meanings.sent5: The unregenerate storm raged on, refusing to dissipate.

meanings.sent1: The unregenerate thief continued to steal, despite multiple warnings.
meanings.sent2: The unregenerate child kept drawing on the walls, no matter how many times he was told not to.
meanings.sent3: The unregenerate cat knocked over the vase for the third time, seemingly enjoying the chaos.
meanings.sent4: His unregenerate habit of arriving late to meetings was like clockwork.
meanings.sent5: The unregenerate criminal refused to change his ways, even after serving time in prison.

meanings.sent1: The unregenerate bully showed no remorse for his actions, even when confronted.
meanings.sent2: The unregenerate dictator ruled with an iron fist, unmoved by pleas for mercy.
meanings.sent3: Despite the embarrassing fall, the unregenerate clown continued with his act, much to the audience's amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her unregenerate optimism shone through even in the darkest of times.
meanings.sent5: The unregenerate rebel refused to conform, standing firm in his beliefs.
